title: FS - T206 Kling Hindu and Manion Piedmont
author: Kingcobb

posts.post_title: FS - T206 Kling Hindu and Manion Piedmont
posts.post_content:
I am continuing to downsize my collection here are a couple of PSA T206's with great eye appeal for sale. Prices include USPS Priority Insured Shipping.
Johnny Kling PSA 3 great almost pinkish color. Sold
George Manion Southern League PSA 4.5 perfect registration Sold
I’ll take the Manion if still available.
